mapper.select: select DISTINCT m.*, sdi.item_value as 'stsName', ai.real_name as 'authorityRealName' from merchant m LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item sdi on sdi.item_key = m.sts LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd on sdi.sys_dict_id = sd.id LEFT JOIN authority_information ai on ai.authority_id = m.authority_id where 1=1 and sd.dict_no = 'examine_sts' and m.merchant_id = #{id}
select m.* from merchant m where 1=1 and m.authority_id = #{userId}
